prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with a rugged, rocky exterior and a playful demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a boulder with arms, ready to battle with determination.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines toughness and agility, with a unique ability to blend in with rocky terrains.
Design a Pokemon that has a sturdy build, perfect for defending its territory in mountainous areas.
Generate a Pokemon that can hurl itself at opponents, showcasing its strength and resilience.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the mountains, with features that suggest endurance and grit.
Make a Pokemon that can adapt to various terrains, with a color palette inspired by natural stones.
